iti36:2.1: “Nayidam, bhikkhave, brahmacariyam vussati janakuhanattham, na janalapanattham, na labhasakkarasilokanisamsattham, na ‘iti mam jano janatu’ti.
iti36:2.2: Atha kho idam, bhikkhave, brahmacariyam vussati abhinnatthanceva parinnatthanca”ti.
iti36:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
